message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but you'll get a good starting point.  We can negotiate further if you'd like.
Alice, your offer was quite lopsided. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor. This reflects the risk I'm taking by letting the money depreciate further.
I'm willing to compromise, but 65/35 is still too much in your favor. Let's split it 60/40 this time.  I'm willing to negotiate further, but we need to move towards a more balanced agreement.
Alice, time is literally money for us in this game!  I'm willing to meet you halfway - 55/45.  It's a fair split considering the depreciation we're both facing.
